claims.claim: Organizations lose effectiveness when they expand regionally or statewide from a local base
claims.quote: when organizations start to expand to being regional and when they start expanding to be statewide, when they started out local they lose a lot of what they had

claims.claim: A model can be partially transferable to replicate success in different regions without direct control
claims.quote: our model is 75% transferable. So if we can convey that 75% to the other 83 counties around us that wanna do something very similar to a brighter way, then we can expand our reach without having to have our hands.  On all of it.

claims.claim: Reentry programs should be accessible regardless of geographic location
claims.quote: it shouldn't matter where you live. , like they say all the time, it shouldn't matter your zip code on what resources are available to you.  They should be available everywhere.
